sentence.Network_en: It is arguable whether the rebels will knuckle under.
sentence.Network_cn: 还不能确定反叛者是否会投降。

sentence.Network_en: It is arguable that giving too much detail may actually be confusing.
sentence.Network_cn: 过分详细反而使人糊涂的说法是有道理的。

sentence.Network_en: The judges said there was at least a good arguable case of negligence to answer.
sentence.Network_cn: 法官们说至少有一个证据确凿的渎职案可作答辩。

list.abs: arguably lifeless , that becomes your own personal ,, 可以认为没有生命 , 成为你私人的,
arguably better : basic science approach -- both descriptive and experimental , and with the perspective of evolution .可认为较佳者︰基础科学方法--以演化的观点分析描述性和实验性两方面。
this account contains many arguable statements ., 这种说法含有很多疑点.

companies arguably fired workers too aggressively this time , but they show little inclination to rehire , even though the recession has supposedly been over for five months now .但这次，公司可以说是过于急切地解雇了许多工人，而且似乎无意重新开始招聘人手，虽然到目前为止衰退按说已经结束五个多月了。

entry.def: If you say that it is arguable that something is true, you believe that it can be supported by evidence and that many people would agree with it.

example.ex: It is arguable that this was not as grave a handicap as it might appear...
example.tran: 有证据表明，这种残障不如看起来那么严重。

example.ex: The judges said there was at least a good arguable case of negligence to answer.
example.tran: 法官们说至少有一个证据确凿的渎职案可作答辩。

entry.tran: 不确定的;无把握的;有疑问的
entry.def: An idea, point, or comment that is arguable is not obviously true or correct and should be questioned.

example.ex: It is arguable whether he ever had much control over the real economic power...
example.tran: 他是否掌控过真正的经济大权还有待证实。

example.ex: He said that her remarks disgusted every practising Christian. That claim is arguable.
example.tran: 他说她的言论让每个虔诚的基督教信徒感到厌恶。这种说法存在疑问。

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being supported by argument

auth_sentence.content: That conclusion, while arguable, strikes us as dubious.
